text.en: Ascertaining the natural state of threefold knowledge,
text.en-trans: khyenpa sum gyi neluk ten la beb

text.en: And practising the key points of the four applications,
text.en-trans: jorwa zhi yi nyamlen né la juk

text.en: One arrives perfectly at the ultimate fruition, dharmakāya—
Mother of the buddhas of the three times, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé yum la solwa deb

text.en: Profound basic space, dharmakāya mother beyond attachment,
text.en-trans: zhenmé chöku yum dön zabmö ying

text.en: Manifests perfectly as the wisdom mudrā of clear realization,
Whose display arises to disciples' perception in wrathful guise—
text.en-trans: namrol duljé nang ngor tröpé tsul

text.en: Exalted Krodhakālī, look upon me with compassion!
Playful dance of emanation bringing benefit to beings,
text.en-trans: drowé dön dzé trulpé namrol gar

text.en: Who fulfilled the aspirations of the great paṇḍitas of India
text.en-trans: gyagar yul du penchen mönlam drub

text.en: And appeared to Tibetans in female human form—
text.en-trans: böyul dro ngor mimö tsul tenpa

text.en: Mother Labkyi Drönma, inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: ama lab kyi drönmé jingyi lob
